abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33177251, pmid33158957, pmid33124607, pmid33146028, pmid33174632, pmid33180952, pmid33166303, pmid33191263, pmid33174624, pmid33165759, pmid33159640, pmid33159380, pmid33166287, pmid33176077
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.11.17
